recipe.title: Strawberry Leather
recipe.ingredients: 2 c Fresh strawberry puree 1 tbsp Lemon juice 1 c Applesauce 1/4 c Sugar
recipe.steps: Combine pureed berries and applesauce with lemon juice and sugar. Line a 10x15 in jelly roll pan with plastic wrap. Pour fruit into pan and spread evenly. Bake about 5 hours at 200F or until leather pulls away from wrap. Flip leather onto counter, peel away plastic and remove any mixture that has not "set." Cut into slices and wrap each in plastic.
